.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetPattern(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface) cil managed

Docs.param: An enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
Docs.summary: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
Docs.returns: The current object, if is a supported value; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> object:
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> is not read-only.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> is not part of the row that is a placeholder for a new item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> object.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> can be selected.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
